title: Cognitive Load Optimization Strategies in Multimedia Science Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental science concepts (basic physics/chemistry)
context.additional_context: Short-term training program for elementary science teachers using smartphone-based VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can analyze complex scientific phenomena step-by-step using descriptive instructions within simulations
Learners can reduce cognitive load by 20% or more through multimedia materials presented in VR environments
Learners demonstrate conceptual understanding by achieving 80% or higher accuracy in simulation assessment tasks

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
